definition: an obstruction/barrier/ill-feeling/grudge
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
misunderstanding/estrangement/(language etc) barrier
grievance/accumulated rancor
doubts and suspicions/a maze of doubts/puzzle/mystery
tight knot/intractable problem
preconceived idea/bias/prejudice
to dispel (enmity, misunderstandings etc)/to vanish (of misgivings, differences of opinion)/thaw (in relations)
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
hatred and desire for revenge
